original_title: Blade Runner: Do Androids Dream Of Electronic Beats?
overview: 35 years ago, Blade Runner and its iconic Vangelis score captured the imagination of a generation of electronic musicians. On the eve of its eagerly awaited sequel, artists old and new explain how electronic music’s obsession with Deckard’s dark, neon dystopia is stronger than ever in our new mini-documentary.
tagline: How Blade Runner impacted electronic music.
title: Blade Runner: Do Androids Dream Of Electronic Beats?
